employee.name: Alex Johnson
employee.bio:
Alex Johnson is a Senior Software Engineer in the Technology & Innovation department at Company X. With over six years of experience in full-stack development, Alex specializes in building scalable web applications, optimizing system performance, and leading cross-functional teams.

Since joining the company in 2020, Alex has played a key role in enhancing platform security, streamlining development workflows, and mentoring junior developers. 

Outside of work, Alex enjoys contributing to open-source projects, hiking, and experimenting with new programming frameworks.
